data_table.description: Framingham Heart Study Neuropsychological Battery Dates, Original, Offspring, Generation 3, New Offspring Spouse, Omni 1, and Omni 2 (all cohorts). NP Battery was performed from 01/1982 to 12/2014. This dataset provides a study participant listing of all neuropsychological battery test dates. A schedule was maintained of study participants who underwent the battery. This schedule formed the basis for this dataset.

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: NPDATE
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
